alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 3:30AM EST until January 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 11 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Western Hampshire MA, Western Hampden MA and Western Franklin MA Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon EST today. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
